name: Freekick - Nojd's Match Report Coloring, v. 1.3
description:
This adds coloring of the denomination words in the match report. It uses the Freekick default colors of the skill denominations.

Version 1.1: Added color for "legendary".
Version 1.2: Added color for "on the right spot".
Version 1.3: Updated for new site design.
